commands.descr: Makes me join your current voice channel.
Show me the door. I'll leave your current voice channel.
Add a specific YouTube URL to the queue. Does not support playlists at this moment.
Amount of results is optional. Default is 1, max. is 5. If your search term starts with a number, use quotation marks.
Shows the queue and its length.
I'll shuffle the queue as well as a deck of cards.
